name: Time To Go Home
description:
Your walk home is normally nothing exciting. That changed when the porcupines started to overpopulate. Weave your way through the traps and blockades without getting poked!

Every few shots your weapon will do less damage, so use it sparingly. It's current damage is displayed in the bottom left.

W A S D to move 

Mouse to aim

Space to jump

Left-click to shoot

Let us know if you find anything interesting! It's our first game jam! 

Everything from the music to the models to the cloud mural on the death scene was made by us, except for one picture from Pixabay!
